meanings.definition: Connect or bring into relation, as thought, feeling, memory, etc.
meanings.sent1: She associates happy memories with her childhood home.
meanings.sent2: He associates the color red with passion.
meanings.sent3: The cat associates the sound of a can opener with mealtime.
meanings.sent4: The smell of fresh bread associates with warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent5: The song associates with a feeling of nostalgia.

meanings.definition: To join as a partner, friend, or companion.
meanings.sent1: She associates with a group of talented musicians.
meanings.sent2: He associates with his classmates during lunch.
meanings.sent3: The dog associates with the neighbor's friendly Labrador.
meanings.sent4: The new employee quickly associates with the team.
meanings.sent5: The child associates with a new friend at the playground.

meanings.definition: A person who shares actively in anything as a business, enterprise, or undertaking.
meanings.sent1: She is one of the key associates in the marketing department.
meanings.sent2: He became an associate in the law firm after passing the bar exam.
meanings.sent3: The young entrepreneur's associate suggested a new marketing strategy.
meanings.sent4: The associate's dedication to the project was commendable.
meanings.sent5: The associate's innovative ideas brought success to the team.
